WorkItem.Description: Polearm class weapons are still not allowed/shown for cat or bear in the current release.

Comments.Message:
You can either do Tools => Load possible upgrades from armory (I didnt test it)
or you can manually add them from here http://www.wowhead.com/?items=2.6#0-4+1 (i tested it and it works)
This does NOT work.  The polearm weapons area already in Rawrs item cache.  Polearms are not being shown because Rawr does not believe druids can equip polearms.

Actually turning on polearms in Tools/Refine types of items ... 
is all it took for me this was previously turned off by default.
This did work.  I would simply suggest that polearms be changed to default checked on in future releases for cat and bear.
They are turned on by default. You just have them specifically turned off in your existing character files.
Astrylian, it is unlikely that anyone turned them off on purpose.  Perhaps, as a low-priority feature request, you could change the way default values are handled?

Oh, I know they're not turned off on purpose, didn't mean to imply that or anything.

That whole filtering system is disappearing in v2.2, so I'm not really looking to make any changes to it right now.
